string-array.name: auto_backup_information_condition_phone
string-array.item: Wayarku na yin caji.
Wayarku baya haɗe da hanyar sadarwa na Wi-Fi.
Allon yana kashe.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_condition_tablet
string-array.item: Tabulet ku na yin caji.
Tabulet ɗinku baya haɗe da hanyar sadarwa na Wi-Fi.
Allon yana kashe.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_device_and_os_differences_contents_phone
string-array.item: Bayanan da za ka iya adanawa zai iya bambanta dangane da wayarka ko tsarin gudanarwa.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_device_and_os_differences_contents_tablet
string-array.item: Bayanan da za ka iya adanawa zai iya bambanta dangane da tabulet ɗinka ko tsarin gudanarwa.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_what_we_cant_backup
string-array.item: Lambobin tuntuɓa: lambobin tuntuɓa daga daidaitaccen asusu
Kalanda: taruka da ayyuka daga ajiyeyyen asusu
Galaxy Themes: launuka da fuskar bango na ainihi
Manhajoji: Sauke fayilolin da basu dace ba da bayanai daga manhajojin da ba na Samsung ba
Folda Mai Kariya: Manhaja da bayanai

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_what_we_cant_backup_basic
string-array.item: Lambobin tuntuɓa: lambobin tuntuɓa daga daidaitaccen asusu
Kalanda: taruka da ayyuka daga ajiyeyyen asusu
Galaxy Themes: launuka da fuskar bango na ainihi
Manhajoji: fayilolin shigarwa marasa tallafi
Folda Mai Kariya: Manhaja da bayanai

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_which_contents
string-array.item: Waya: tarihin kira da saƙonni
Saƙonni: saƙonni da aka haɓaka, saƙonnin maltimidiya, da saƙonnin rubutu
"Lambobin Tuntuɓa: lambobin tuntuɓa, adireshin imel, da katunan kasuwanci da aka ajiye akan na'urarku"
"Kalanda: taruka da ayyuka da aka ajiye akan na'ura ku"
Agogo: alam, agogon duniya, da mai naɗa lokaci

"Saiti: damar izinin shiga saiti, sautin ringi, zaɓin Allon madannan Samsung, saitunan Wi-Fi, haɗaɗɗen na'urorin Bluetooth, saitin gane fuska, saitin zanen hannu, da saitunan Always On Display (waƙoƙin ringi na ainihi ba zai ajiyu ba)"
Allon gida: shimfidawa, fuskar bangon waya, da saitunan Samsung DeX
Manhajoji: ɗaura fayiloli da saitunan manhajoji
Naɗa murya: naɗawa

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_which_contents_premium
string-array.item: Kiɗa: MP3, FLAC, WAV, M4A, OGG, da sauran fayilolin kiɗa
Takardu: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, da sauran takardu
App data: data from non-Samsung apps

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_apps
string-array.item: %s: tarihin chat
%s: bayanan kula da aka kulle
%s: bayanan da aka tsare da kalmar sirri
%s: manhajoji da bayanan manhajoji
%s: Aukuwa da suka faru daga asusun da aka daidaita
Samsung Blockchain Keystore
Keɓaɓɓen mabudi da kalmar dawowa
Bayanan da ba za a iya ajiyewa ba saboda dokokin manhajar
Manhajoji da ba za a iya turawa ba saboda matsalolin tsaro ko dacewa: %s

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_contacts
string-array.item: Karanta lambobin tuntuɓa kawai

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_home_screen
string-array.item: Asalin fuskar allo
Hoton fuskar allo na Galaxy Themes

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_messages
string-array.item: Saƙonnin faɗakarwa na gaggawa
Saƙonnin da aka dana da saƙon ya faɗi
Saƙonni tare da tasiran iMessage

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_secure_folder
string-array.item: Ƙunshin bayani da aka kulle

string-array.name: what_can_i_encrypt_contents
string-array.item: Waya: tarihin kira da saƙonni
Saƙonni: saƙonni da aka haɓaka, saƙonnin maltimidiya, da saƙonnin rubutu
Agogo: alam, agogon duniya, da mai naɗa lokaci

"Saituna: saitunan samun izinin shiga, sautin ringi, zaɓuɓɓukan Allon Madannan Samsung, Saitunan Wi-Fi, na'urorin Bluetooth da aka haɗa, da kuma saitunan Always On Display (aininhin ringi ba wanda aka kulle ba)"
Manhajoji: saitunan manhaja
Allon gida: shimfidawa, fuskar bangon waya, da saitunan Samsung DeX
Naɗa murya: naɗawa
